entry.title: Diablo 4 Has Gone Gold Ahead Of June Launch
entry.content:
Blizzard Entertainment has announced that Diablo IV--the latest installment in its demon-slaying RPG franchise--has officially gone gold, which means the game has reached a completed enough state for discs to begin printing, ahead of the game's June 6 launch on consoles and PC.
The official Diablo Twitter account announced the game's gold status today, with an image featuring the game's main antagonist Lilith accompanying the announcement. "Can you feel her presence now?" the tweet said, referring to the pictured villain.
#DiabloIV has Gone Gold. Can you feel her presence now?See you in Sanctuary. 6.6.23 🔥 pic.twitter.com/OGX8oACUCr
Recent beta tests across all consoles and PC resulted in Blizzard's announcement of multiple changes that will be made to the game, including optimized dungeons and major changes to all classes. The most recent issue of Game Informer ran a cover story on the game, which revealed it will receive new story content "every three months."
The new Diablo is slated to be the largest game in the franchise's history, with over 120 dungeons, dozens of side quests, world bosses, and more available in the main story. New endgame content has also been added, which includes paragon boards, designated PvP zones, and new challenges called Nightmare Dungeons.
Diablo IV launches June 6 for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and PC.


詳細句子文法解析：
1. "Blizzard Entertainment has announced that Diablo IV--the latest installment in its demon-slaying RPG franchise--has officially gone gold"，這個句子是一個緊湊式的複合句，主要介紹了這個遊戲已經進入製作階段。在其中，"has gone gold"是過去分詞的被動語態，表示遊戲已經到達可以製作光碟的階段。
2. "which means the game has reached a completed enough state for discs to begin printing, ahead of the game's June 6 launch on consoles and PC."，這個句子中使用了"which means"進行解釋，其後面的部分則是補充說明前面已經介紹的情況。
3. "The official Diablo Twitter account announced the game's gold status today, with an image featuring the game's main antagonist Lilith accompanying the announcement."，這個句子是一個復合句，表示官方的Twitter網站公佈了遊戲的製作進度，並附上了此遊戲的主要反派角色Lilith的圖像。
4. ""Can you feel her presence now?" the tweet said, referring to the pictured villain."，這個句子使用了問句來引起讀者的興趣，並藉由反派角色的圖像來與讀者進行連結，讓讀者對此遊戲更感興趣。
5. "Recent beta tests across all consoles and PC resulted in Blizzard's announcement of multiple changes that will be made to the game, including optimized dungeons and major changes to all classes."，這個句子是由一個主要子句"Recent beta tests across all consoles and PC resulted in Blizzard's announcement"以及一個並列子句"that will be made to the game"所構成的複合句。
6. "The most recent issue of Game Informer ran a cover story on the game, which revealed it will receive new story content "every three months."”，這個句子是由一個主要子句"The most recent issue of Game Informer ran a cover story on the game"以及一個關係代詞子句"which revealed it will receive new story content "every three months.""所構成的複合句。
7. "The new Diablo is slated to be the largest game in the franchise's history, with over 120 dungeons, dozens of side quests, world bosses, and more available in the main story."，這個句子是以名言動態的方式呈現遊戲的規模。"slated to be"指出了將來會成為最大的遊戲，在其中也列出了一些遊戲包含的元素。
8. "New endgame content has also been added, which includes paragon boards, designated PvP zones, and new challenges called Nightmare Dungeons."，這個句子使用了資訊呈現的方式來介紹遊戲中新增的遊戲功能。
9. "Diablo IV launches June 6 for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, and PC."，這個句子主要講述遊戲發行平台以及遊戲發行日期，使用了詳細的句法結構。
10. 在"#DiabloIV has Gone Gold. Can you feel her presence now?See you in Sanctuary. 6.6.23 🔥"的這段話中，最後的表情符號和火焰的圖案則是想試著讓讀者進一步進入遊戲的情感世界中，互相分享此刻的興奮。

單字：
1. franchise（n.）：特許權經營、加盟連鎖店。容易記憶方式：聯想戰鬥競賽。
2. recipient（n.）：接受者。容易記憶方式：分解成recip的拿，以及ient的形容詞後綴，可以聯想為能夠拿到的人便是接受者。
3. optimize（v.）：優化。容易記憶方式：中文企業熟悉的口號"創優不創新"，記憶時諧音優、yahoo都可以聯想。
4. antagonist（n.）：反派角色。容易記憶方式：由anti-和gon(=fight)這兩個相對的詞根組成，便是指敵對劇中角色。
5. paragon（n.）：模範。容易記憶方式：paragon的par與perfection的per諧音，在記憶時可以聯想到一個完美無缺的表現。
6. designated（adj.）：指定的。容易記憶方式：designated的design可聯想到設計或是指導，容易具象化記憶。
7. dungeon（n.）：地下城。容易記憶方式：dungeon的dun在音上有點像墩子的讀音，所以可以聯想成地下墩子。
8. optimize（v.）：優化。容易記憶方式：中文企業熟悉的口號"創優不創新"，記憶時諧音優、yahoo都可以聯想。
9. franchise（n.）：特許權經營、加盟連鎖店。容易記憶方式：聯想戰鬥競賽。
10. villain（n.）：反派角色。容易記憶方式：此單字在許多大眾日報小說飛天網二三事裡頭出現頻率很高，因此可以聯想為小說中的魔王。
